title: buying RP points
body: my card was charged 2 times yesterday and I didn't get my RP points for 35$ charge of 2 times.... and I wasn't able to type in my card 3 digit key number on the back of my card so why was my card charged 2 times for 35$ and I didn't get my RP points????????

replies.body:
Hey marinesslayer - 

If you were charged incorrectly, please [shoot a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support so we can take a look at your account and make any necessary adjustments.
